quotes.quote: Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it...you can still decide not to pass through.

Urgent, meet us outside the Urahara Shop immediately. P.S: If you're thinking that this message is like some written in the victim's own blood cliché from some TV show...then you obviously have no sense of humor!
quotes.to: Urahara writes a message in blood

quotes.quote: There is nothing, but fear reflected in your sword. When you dodge, you're afraid of getting killed. When you attack, you're afraid of killing someone. Even when you try to protect someone, you're afraid of letting them die. Yes, your sword speaks to me only of absurd fear. What's necessary in a fight isn't fear. Nothing can be born of that. When you dodge,
Puh-Lease! I'm just a lowly-but-handsome merchant. How could I possibly perform Bankai?
A warrior who has lost his strength will only get in the way.

I won't get hit by any more of those. I've analyzed that technique's Reishi composition and even the patterns in your muscle movements when you fire. If I know those two things, I can dodge it or by timing it right, I can cancel it out. But that's difficult in its own right.

"I made a decision when I got out of bed this morning. 'Once I get out of this bed, I'm a member of the Twelfth Division. From now on, I'm only going to get angry if someone badmouths the Twelfth Division.' After all, I think changing what makes you mad and what doesn't is kind of basically the same thing as 'changing your own feelings'. Right?
That I was never able to fully control. True enough. Back then, I couldn't.
You give me too much credit. These days, I'm just a plain old candy-store owner.
If we want to witness something nobody has ever seen before, we'll create it ourselves. That's how us scientists are.
If I prepare a thousand options, all I need is for one of them to work. So I make a habit of preparing anything and everything that shows any kind of promise. That's just how I work.
What’s so outrageous? This is a real battle. If you lose, you die. Taking every possible precaution to avoid death...isn't that what everyone does?

description: Hanatarō Yamada (山田 花太郎, Yamada Hanatarō) is the co-3rd Seat and former 7th Seat of the 4th Division in the Gotei 13, serving as the leader of the 14th Advanced Relief Team. Hanatarō is a short male Shinigami with blue eyes[2] and chin-length black hair, with bangs framing the side of his face. He wears a standard shihakushō, with the Fourth Division medical kit worn over his shoulder. He tends to be clumsy and easily duped.

Professional Status.position: Co-3rd Seat of the 4th Division Leader of the 14th Advanced R.T.

name.kanji: 山本元柳斎 重國, Yamamoto Genryūsai Shigekuni) was the captain of the 1st Division in the Gotei 13 and also the Captain-Commander of the whole Gotei 13. His lieutenant was Chōjirō Sasakibe. After being cast into Hell, he has gained the epithet of "Founder of the Gotei" (護廷開祖

description: Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto (山本元柳斎 重國, Yamamoto Genryūsai Shigekuni) was the captain of the 1st Division in the Gotei 13 and also the Captain-Commander of the whole Gotei 13. His lieutenant was Chōjirō Sasakibe. After being cast into Hell, he has gained the epithet of "Founder of the Gotei" (護廷開祖, Gotei Kaiso; Viz "Court Guard Founder").[3] Yamamoto is a fair-skinned man of average height.

Ryūjin Jakka in its first appearance.

description: Yuyu Yayahara (八々原　熊如, Yayahara Yuyu) is the lieutenant of the 8th Division of the Gotei 13 under Captain Lisa Yadōmaru.[1] Yuyu is a young woman with dark brown skin, achieved through tanning, and long blond hair that transitions to a darker color at the tips and is arranged in a large ponytail tied up by a beaded band with two long bangs framing her face, as well as light-colored eyes and a small nose.

media.alt: Yuyu decapitates a Jigoku no Gaki.

description: Rikichi Yuki (行木 理吉, Yuki Rikichi)[1] is an unseated officer of the 6th Division. Rikichi is a young male of average height with black hair and grey eyes. He has a tattoo above his left eye, in admiration for Renji Abarai. His hair is parted on the left and fans out at the tips. Also, on the left side of his head, three RCA cables are tied to his hair. Besides the standard Shinigami uniform, he wears a thin rope sash connecting the supply kit on his back.

media.alt: Rikichi stands over Renji as he is healed by Hanatarō.

description: Ryūnosuke Yuki (行木 竜ノ介, Yuki Ryūnosuke) is one of the Shinigami that replaces Zennosuke Kurumadani as the guardian of the Karakura Town area. Ryūnosuke has black hair and green eyes. He wears a standard Shinigami shihakushō. He has three circular hair clips on the left side and two on the right side of his hair. Ryūnosuke is a timid and soft person.[1] He is also shown to be nervous and easily gets frightened, this is shown when four large Hollows appeared to attack him.

media.alt: Ryūnosuke sees Shino unconscious in the hands of Hollows.
Ryūnosuke gets a call from Soul Society.
Ryūnosuke about to face a Sternritter.

description: Kenpachi Zaraki in "THE UNDEAD"I'd forgotten it for a long time...the pain of not having a name. Those other guys had names that others called them, but I didn't. So, that kinda feelin'... Kenpachi Zaraki (更木 剣八, Zaraki Kenpachi) is the current captain of the 11th Division in the Gotei 13. He is the eleventh Kenpachi to hold the position.[3] His first lieutenant was Yachiru Kusajishi and his current lieutenant is Ikkaku Madarame.

quotes.quote: I'd forgotten it for a long time...the pain of not having a name. Those other guys had names that others called them, but I didn't. So, that kinda feelin'...
I named you Yachiru, in memory of the only person I ever admired.
I want to get stronger. I've finally found a worthy opponent. I can get stronger. I want to fight. I want to get stronger. It sure has been a while. To feel this desire again. I want to get stronger.
You are shameless to sneak around like that, guys. Cowardly hiding spiritual pressure and stalking others isn't something that captains should do.
Blah blah blah! You're noisy! Just come on and fight already. It's best if all four of you come together. If you four surround me and attack at once, maybe one of you will actually wound me.
quotes.to: Sajin Komamura, Kaname Tōsen, Tetsuzaemon Iba, and Shūhei Hisagi

quotes.quote: Sanity? Worthless things like that, I never had them for as long as I can remember!
So you want to fight too? Fine, you can have them, but fight elsewhere. If you get in my way, I'll chop you up first.
This Reiatsu... Even though I don't know who it's from, they seem to be deep in the heat of battle. Not bad. It sure makes your blood boil, doesn't it?

Never admit defeat and ask for a quick death! Die first, then admit defeat! If you are defeated but didn't die, it just means you were lucky! At those times, think only about survival! Survive and think only about killing the one who failed to kill you!
Sorry but I'm not interested in weaklings who can't fight any more. Besides, I don't have any obligation to finish you off.
Not criminals? That's rich, coming from you. You know damn well that if we weren't so damn powerful, petty criminals is all the both of us would be!

What’s that face for? Did you 'imagine' I wouldn’t be able to cut you? Just so you know, there ain't a damn thing your little brain can come up with that I won't be able to slice through. I'm the Kenpachi.

description: These are miscellaneous current and former members of the Gotei 13. Chikane Iba (射場千鉄, Iba Chikane) is the former lieutenant of the 3rd Division while Rōjūrō Ōtoribashi was the captain over 100 years ago. She is the mother of Tetsuzaemon Iba.[2] Chikane has gray eyes and thin eyebrows. She has dark hair with a large gray streak running along the top left side of her head.

description: Rabu Aikawa (愛川 羅武, Aikawa Rabu), more commonly referred to as Love (ラヴ, Ravu), is a Visored and the former captain of the 7th Division. His lieutenant was Jinemon Kotsubaki. Love is a tall Visored with brown eyes and a thick black spiked afro which adds further to his above average height. Love sports a green jogging suit and wears mirrored sunglasses at all times. When he was a captain, 110 years ago, his hair was in a classic, rounded afro style with long sideburns.

media.alt: Love as the captain of the 7th Division.
Love keeps Hiyori away from Shinji.
Captains discuss the changes within the Gotei 13.

quotes.quote: Oh, mine only lasts about three minutes. I'm a hero, y'see.
quotes.to: Starrk, referring to the Visored and their masks

quotes.quote: Is that right. How about you try and aesthetically not get yourself buried in the first place in the future.
quotes.to: After Rose complains about his hair

quotes.quote: Once a guy's comrade falls, the battle gets personal.

That's what makes him so scary. There's not a guy in the world who isn't affected at all by a comrade's death. If his comrade's death causes him to falter, we take advantage. If his comrade's death drives him to anger, we strike him down before he can let it out. In either case, speed is of the essence!
Now that's a surprise! I always thought you Hollow scum didn't have hearts or feelings!

description: Shinji redirects here. For the anime-exclusive character from episode 133, see Shinji Iijima. Shinji Hirako (平子 真子, Hirako Shinji) is the captain of the 5th Division in the Gotei 13. His lieutenant is Momo Hinamori. He also served as a recruiter and the de facto leader of the Visored. He was also a captain over 100 years ago prior to his exile and was reinstated to his old post sometime after the battle against Sōsuke Aizen.

quotes.quote: I hate to talk like I'm better'n you or whatever, but I'd like to just give you a little tip, as a guy who's had a little experience at this job. When ya find yourself in a position of command, even if ya sympathize with 'em, ya can't be too sensitive to your subordinates' feelings. You do things how you wanna do 'em. An' if doin' it your own way doesn't work out, then that just means the job ain't for you.
'Pretty good, huh? Doing things in reverse is my specialty.
I swear. I really don't like gettin' involved in Shinigami fights. Oh well. When you hear the sound of fighting so close by you can't just ignore it.
Can't ya hold back a little while you're fighting? If I dodge an attack and the city gets destroyed bit by bit instead, then I can't just ignore it and keep dodging.

I remember what Urahara said. 'I made no miscalculations. That was my greatest miscalculation of all.' And just like he predicted, the worst-case scenario came to pass. Man, we sure owe a lot to them. To Urahara, and also to Aizen, an' all. Let's go.
quotes.to: Before leaving to fight in the war

quotes.quote: Can't say I've got much to settle with you. Although I do kinda wish you guys hadn't gone an' set up that crazy strong barrier before you started fightin'!
Well, ain't the answer to that freakin' obvious? Not a chance. We ain't your allies or nothin'. We're just Aizen's enemies. Oh, an' we're also Ichigo's allies.
quotes.to: Yamamoto, after being asked if the Visored were on the Shinigami's side

quotes.quote: You sure 'bout that? Jumpin' in to help a bunch of total unknowns like us? Well, not that I'm quite sure what the heck you are either.

Up, down, left, right, back, front, the directions the damage is comin' from... do you really think you can wrap your head around fightin' with them all flipped around? Not a chance. Ain't no-one can do that. The stronger a guy is, the more used to battle he gets... the more naturally his body reacts to exactly what it sees!!

description: This article is about the Ninth Division Lieutenant Mashiro Kuna. For the SRDI researcher, see Niko Kuna. Mashiro Kuna (久南 白, Kuna Mashiro) is the co-lieutenant of the 9th Division, currently under Kensei Muguruma and is currently a member of the Visored. Mashiro's appearance is that of a young woman with hazel eyes. She wears a white bodysuit with orange gloves, boots and scarf, along with a set of goggles atop her lime green hair.

media.alt: Mashiro during her time as the 9th Division lieutenant.
Mashiro shows Kensei the empty shihakushō.
Mashiro catches Kensei's hand in her sleep.
Mashiro and the others are transported to Kisuke's lab by Tessai.

Mashiro throws a tantrum because of Hachi's new friendship with Orihime.

quotes.quote: Bahhhhhh~~! What are you, Kensei, stupid~? How long d'you think I can stay in Hollow form for, huh?! It's fifteen hours, okay? Fifteen hours! I could stay like this right into the night if I wanted to!
How dare you. You ruined my precious scarf! I'm not forgiving you now!!
K... Kensei...... Are you gonna... avenge me......? Heheh...

description: Kensei Muguruma (六車 拳西, Muguruma Kensei) is the captain of the 9th Division in the Gotei 13. His lieutenants are Shūhei Hisagi and Mashiro Kuna. He is a Visored. He was also a captain over 100 years ago prior to his exile, and was reinstated to his old post some time after the battle against Sōsuke Aizen. Kensei is a tall, muscular man with sharp features, short light-gray/silver hair and brown eyes.

media.alt: Kensei during his time as a captain displaying his "69" tattoo.

Tekken Tachikaze emitting exposive force upon contact.

quotes.quote: You're alive! You should be happy! So smile!

name.kanji: 鳳橋 楼十郎, Ōtoribashi Rōjūrō), more commonly referred to as Rose (ローズ

description: Rōjūrō Ōtoribashi (鳳橋 楼十郎, Ōtoribashi Rōjūrō), more commonly referred to as Rose (ローズ, Rōzu), is the captain of the 3rd Division in the Gotei 13 and a Visored. His lieutenant is Izuru Kira. He was also a Captain over 100 years ago prior to his exile, and was reinstated to his old post some time after the battle against Sōsuke Aizen. Rose has purple eyes, long, wavy, blond hair and a perpetually bored expression. Rose wears a black suit with a thigh-length, black jacket.

media.alt: Rose as the 3rd Division captain, 110 years ago, with Shinji.
Rose helps pin Hollow Ichigo down.
Rose and the Visored watch Ichigo training.

Rose using his powers to kill the Menos.

quotes.quote: I bet he's happy, because we hardly meet anybody with powers similar to ours. I feel like our family is growing.
quotes.to: About Hachigen Ushōda and Orihime Inoue

quotes.quote: Come along. That's right... right this way. Slowly does it... closer and closer... until you are captive to my melody.

Banding together to face a common enemy is sometimes referred to as a dark trait of humanity, but that's not quite right. It is no 'dark trait', but rather a basic animal survival instinct. Frankly, it is at times such as these that human emotional connection is at its most-
quotes.to: he is then interrupted by Love

quotes.quote: My hair! There is such a thing as aesthetics, you know, even when escaping from a pile of rubble!
quotes.to: After Love grabs him by his hair

quotes.quote: Watching over Izuru always provides me with the most remarkable inspiration. Just by holding a guitar in his presence, I find the melodies well up like tears unbidden. If Izuru were to be gone, my Flying V too will mourn.
What manner of guitar could fail to cry when faced with the deaths of so many men? My guitar is already crying. I hope you don't expect to leave this place alive... Quincy.
Kinshara Butōdan is a dance troupe of death. The payment for their performance is your life.

My techniques are indeed tricks. However, it is always trickery that captures the hearts of the public. I'll tell you what my Zanpakutō controls - 'music'. Its deceptive melodies resound in your ears and give me power over your very heart. If my deceptions capture your heart, they can burn your body, and even stop your breath. Now. Let us finish with a dance I'm sure will suit you wonderfully.

description: Hiyori Sarugaki (猿柿 ひよ里, Sarugaki Hiyori) is the former lieutenant of the 12th Division under Captains Kirio Hikifune and Kisuke Urahara, and currently a Visored. Hiyori is a very short, brown eyed, blonde-haired girl who wears her short hair in spiky pigtails with her bangs clipped together by three clips. She wears a white shirt and a red jogging suit, the latter with white lines running down from the shoulders and decorated with the first kanji of her name, as well as yellow flip flops.

quotes.quote: A princess and a tiger, huh? Such excessive names! Our names mean 'monkey' and 'lewd!' I'm so jealous!
I really, really hate humans. I really hate Shinigami too.
I don't want to be helping you out Shinigami!! But this isn't the time for that!!
I'm...sorry...Shinji......I...was impatient...

name.kanji: 有昭田 鉢玄, Ushōda Hachigen) is a Visored
name.romaji: formerly the lieutenant of the Kidō Corps under Tessai Tsukabishi. He is usually referred to as Hacchi (ハッチ; sometimes translated as "Hutch"

description: Hachigen Ushōda (有昭田 鉢玄, Ushōda Hachigen) is a Visored, formerly the lieutenant of the Kidō Corps under Tessai Tsukabishi. He is usually referred to as Hacchi (ハッチ; sometimes translated as "Hutch"). Hachi is a very large and rotund man. He wears an olive-green tuxedo with a yellow bow tie. He has golden eyes, a pink mustache and pink hair with a black cross-bone design in the center. During his time in Soul Society, he wore a long purple mantle over standard Shinigami robes.

quotes.quote: What’s important is not 'how it should be,' but rather 'how you want it to be.'
Now, now, I think we're all getting a bit overexcited. This is not a festival, you know. So let's all quiet down.
You don't need a special reason... for two groups of strangers to join forces.
I have seen your ability and that is exactly why I came here. As long as one does not touch them, all abilities are equal and not deserving of fear.
In Soul Society, there is no being with

description: Lisa Yadōmaru (矢胴丸 リサ, Yadōmaru Risa) is a Visored and the current captain of the 8th Division. Her Lieutenant is Yuyu Yayahara. She is the former lieutenant of the 8th Division under Captain Shunsui Kyōraku.[2] Lisa's appearance is of a young adult woman with turquoise eyes, red oval glasses and long black hair. Her hair has bangs in the front and she keeps the back in a braided ponytail.

An alternate-universe Lisa from the Spirit Society.

quotes.quote: The more you try an' hide something away, the more people want to see it!

description: Aida (会田, Aida) is a Shinigami of the Third Division during the tenure of Shūsuke Amagai as the Division's captain. Aida has brown slick hair that is combed to the right. He has black colored eyes and has a long nose that is centered in the middle of his face. Initially, Aida is very broody and unlike Inose, is not very vocal about his disappointment regarding the appointment of Amagai as his new captain.

media.alt: Aida and Inose discuss the new captain.
Aida and Inose offer to clean up.
Aida expresses his happiness with training.

description: Shūsuke Amagai (天貝 繍助, Amagai Shūsuke) was a captain of the 3rd Division, succeeding Gin Ichimaru.[1] He is responsible for orchestrating the events of the Kasumiōji Conspiracy.[2] Shūsuke Amagai has a rather unkempt appearance, due to his messy hair and chin stubble. He is a tall, muscular Shinigami who has chin-length blueish hair that he wears in a somewhat ragged fashion. As opposed to his predecessor, he wears a long-sleeved captain's haori.

Professional Status.previous position: Captain of the 3rd Division Patrol Group Leader

media.alt: The son of Shin'etsu Kisaragi, finding his dying father.
Amagai during his time in the Patrol Corps.
Izuru Kira welcomes Amagai into the 3rd Division.

Amagai's Bakkōtō in its true form.

quotes.quote: The gap felt by those who have been abandoned... The hatred by those who survived... Those who receive the burden of emotions as bleak accept being controlled by them. All I wanted was the death of them. This question haunted my thoughts but the answer had already been lost.

description: Baishin (白沙, Baishin) is a Shinigami who merged with his Zanpakutō and subsequently went on a killing rampage.[1] Baishin is a middle aged, grey-haired man with a beard and blades growing out of his shoulders. He has two red marks on his forehead. He wears a samurai-like armor over his Shinigami hakama.[1] Baishin appears to be a violent man who would kill anyone around him in an uncontrollable rampage.

media.alt: The six captains sent to confront Baishin.

quotes.quote: I am a Blade.

name.kanji: 猿猴川流三郎, Enkōgawa Rusaburō), commonly called Enryū (猿龍

description: Rusaburō Enkōgawa (猿猴川流三郎, Enkōgawa Rusaburō), commonly called Enryū (猿龍, Enryū), is one of Rurichiyo Kasumiōji's bodyguards during the Kasumiōji Conspiracy. Enryū is a muscular man with a small Mohawk in the shape of a lightning bolt. Under his standard Shinigami uniform is a light purple garment. He also wears large sunglasses and often has an unusual expression on his face. During the Kasumiōji Conspiracy, Enryū didn't speak at all. He instead uses sign language that only Kenryū understands.

media.alt: Enryū and Kenryū rescue Rurichiyo, leaving the Hollows to Ichigo.
Enryū and Kenryū tell the gate guards to stand down as they look for Rurichiyo.
Enryū carries Rurichiyo on his shoulder, fleeing from assassin Jinnai Dōko.
Enryū releases his Zanpakutō to create a diversion.
Enryū watches Kenryū and Rurichiyo argue at the table.

description: Seizo Harugasaki (春ヶ崎 歲晴, Harugasaki Seizo) is a former member of the Gotei 13's 11th Division. Seizo is a tall, muscular man with brownish-red hair. He has long sideburns and a long ponytail hanging down his back kept in place with a red tie. His face has some slight stubble growing above his lip and on his chin. Seizo wears a standard shihakushō but with a few small variations. He keeps the sleeves rolled up onto his shoulders at all times.

media.alt: Seizo is drained of his power.
Ikkaku and Seizo attack a Hollow.
The 11th Division forms a guard of honor for Seizo.

quotes.quote: I know that it's impossible! But I won't give up, no matter how many times I fail!
So this is where I die. But that's okay. Thank you Ichigo Kurosaki. You have made me regain my honor as a Shinigami in my final moments.

description: Maki Ichinose (一之瀬 真樹, Ichinose Maki) is a Shinigami ally of Jin Kariya and a former member of the 11th Division under the former captain, Kenpachi Kiganjō. Ichinose is a tall, fair-skinned, lean-built man with brown eyes, sharp eyebrows, and short, shaggy raven-black hair that frames his face and arches upward on either temple to hang down in the center of his forehead in a large bang.

media.alt: Ichinose retains his morals even after abandoning the Gotei 13.
Ichinose acts as Kariya's right-hand man and confidante.
Ichinose fails to avenge Kenpachi Kiganjō against Kenpachi Zaraki and is disgraced.
Jin Kariya saves Ichinose from a Hollow that was about to kill him, earning his devotion.
Gō Koga joins Ichinose in the Bount Mansion.
Ichinose confronts Rukia Kuchiki and the Mod-Souls.
Ichinose kills Ryō Utagawa for betraying Kariya.
Ichinose and the Bount watch the mansion burn after Yoshino Sōma and Uryū Ishida are rescued.
Ichinose prevents Ichigo Kurosaki from interfering.
Ichinose and the Bount join Kariya in the cave.
Ichinose protects Mabashi from Shūhei Hisagi when the former is overwhelmed.
An invisible Ichinose infiltrates the Seireitei through the Senkaimon.
Ichinose enters Soul Society alongside the Bount.
Ichinose and Koga speak to the people of Kusajishi.
Ichinose confronts and clashes with Tōshirō Hitsugaya after Kariya enacts his siege.
Kenpachi Zaraki confronts Ichinose and offers a chance at revenge.
Ichinose clashes with Zaraki for the final time after having his ideals questioned.
Kariya kills Ichinose for turning on him.
Ichinose displays the light-manipulating power of Nijigasumi.
Renji Abarai is tricked into attacking Tōshirō Hitsugaya within the Brilliant Void.
Ichinose traps Kenpachi Zaraki within Saigyoku Nijigasumi.

description: Inose (猪瀬, Inose) is a Shinigami of the 3rd Division during the tenure of Shūsuke Amagai as 3rd Division captain. Inose is a tall Shinigami with a larger build than many of his peers. He has dark eyes and long, dark hair which is tied at the back of his neck in a pony-tail with a red tie. His face is large, with big lips and small, dark eyes. He also wears the standard Shinigami uniform.

media.alt: Inose discusses the new captain with Aida.
Inose and Aida are unimpressed with Amagai.
Inose is saved from the Cero by Kibune.
The 3rd Division on the mission with the cat.
Inose states his admiration of Amagai and Kibune.
The 3rd Division wait at the assembly site.
Inose reveals he did the Fourth Division laundry.
Inose tries to stop a fight breaking out.
The other divisions pass the 3rd Division.
The 3rd Division members express their happiness at gaining some respect and good guidance.

name: Kanō
description: This article is about the 3rd Division Shinigami, for the Shinigami who once lived in the Forest of Menos, see Ashido Kanō. Kanō (嘉納) is a Shinigami of the 3rd Division during the tenure of Shūsuke Amagai as the Division's captain. As a Shinigami, Kanō wears the standard shihakushō uniform that other Shinigami wear with his Zanpakutō strapped to his waist. He has a long face with small, black eyes and blue eyebrows. His blue hair has a rise to it and spikes back, away from his face.

media.alt: Kanō and Izuru watch, stunned, as Amagai confronts the Kōtotsu.
The division succeed in their goal.
Kanō is made to do the 11th Divisions shopping.
Everyone is shocked by Inose's admission.
The Shinigami decide to follow Kibune instead of Izuru.
Kanō is ordered to help Izuru.
They nervously watch the conclusion of the battle.

description: Ashido Kanō (狩能 雅忘人, Kanō Ashido) is a Shinigami trapped in Hueco Mundo. Ashido has peach skin, thin red-brownish eyebrows, red-brownish spiky hair and dark-black irises. He wears the white kimono undergarment underneath his standard Shinigami uniform, in ragged condition and without any footwear, with a brown fur coat draped over himself. The coat has five Hollow masks adorning the back of it, which he utilizes in a variety of ways.

media.alt: Ashido and his comrades several hundred years ago.
Promotional artwork of Ashido in Bleach: Brave Souls.

quotes.quote: It’s the Menos’ nesting grounds. A world far removed from where Soul Society’s laws carry any meaning.

name.kanji: 犬崎劉聖, Kenzaki Ryūsei), commonly referred to as Kenryū (犬龍

description: Ryūsei Kenzaki (犬崎劉聖, Kenzaki Ryūsei), commonly referred to as Kenryū (犬龍, Kenryū), is a servant of Rurichiyo Kasumiōji, the princess of the Kasumiōji noble family during the Kasumiōji Conspiracy. Kenryū wears the standard Shinigami uniform with a light garment underneath. He also wears gray gloves that extend halfway to his elbows. His hair is a blue-black and his eyes are an icy blue. Because of Enryū's quiet nature, he acts as the spokesperson for Rurichiyo, explaining much of her history.

media.alt: Kenryū arrives in the Human World alongside Enryū and Rurichiyo.
Kenryū and the others search for Rurichiyo in the palace grounds.
Kenryū attempts to stall Jinnai Dōko with his Zanpakutō.
Kenryū and Enryū restrained by Ōmaeda.
Kenryū attacks Amagai with Sange in a bid to protect Rurichiyo.

description: Makoto Kibune (貴船 理, Kibune Makoto) is a former member of the Patrol Group and is the 3rd Division's Third Seat. He is also one of the key figures of the Kasumiōji Conspiracy. Makoto has red brown hair, slicked back, with one strand from his bangs arced up and the ends curving forward. He has yellow eyes and wears purple-rimmed half glasses. Under the standard Shinigami uniform he wore a light purple sweater.

Professional Status.previous position: 3rd Seat of the 3rd Division Patrol Group Member

media.alt: Makoto during his time in the Shin'ō Academy.
Kibune and Kira come at odds with one another over Shinta's fate.
Kibune informs Rurichiyo that he will be killing Ichigo for interfering with his plans.
Kibune is cut down by Izuru Kira.

quotes.quote: "I will eliminate everyone like you, powerless fools promoted to positions like lieutenant! To be weak is a sin. I will not allow men like you are in that position! You couldn't even stop the previous captain's betrayal! His existence without power haven't right to be above me!

description: Shin'etsu Kisaragi (如月 秦戉, Kisaragi Shin'etsu) was a Shinigami from the First Division and the father of Shūsuke Amagai.[1] Shin'etsu keeps his dark brown hair in a messy fashion and he has a small beard. As a seated member, he wore the standard Shinigami uniform, albeit it was tattered.[1] When the Kasumiōji Clan began manufacturing the Bakkōtō, the Central 46 denied Captain Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto's request to investigate the clan's compound.

Kōga Kuchiki (朽木 響河, Kuchiki Kōga) is a former 3rd Seat of the 6th Division who later revolted against the Seireitei. He was also a member of the Kuchiki Clan, having married into it. Kōga is a well-toned man with piercing green eyes, shoulder-length black hair, and a long ponytail of red hair, with bangs hanging on the right side of his face to frame it.

media.alt: Kōga releases his Zanpakutō against the rebels.
Kōga is put in charge of a special contingency force.
Kōga and Muramasa are surrounded by the Onmitsukidō.
Muramasa materializes, freeing Kōga from imprisonment.
Kōga ambushes the officials who framed him.
Kōga's instability grows, gradually making him believe that everyone opposed him.
Kōga sealed in the Shisō Keppū spell cast by Yamamoto.
Byakuya prevents Kōga from killing Muramasa.
Kōga prepares to resume his fight against Byakuya.
Kōga explains his intentions and views to Byakuya.
Kōga wields one of the halberds.
Kōga uses his Illusions against Byakuya.
Kōga activates his Bankai, Mukōjōchū Muramasa.
Ginrei closing his heart against Muramasa's powers.

quotes.quote: I pledge my life in an effort to bring peace to this world.
You're right. Trusting in myself is the answer, and that in turn will lead to peace.
Let me make one thing clear, Muramasa. I am the master here, and as such I am in charge. I will not be ordered around by a Zanpakutō spirit!

I thought they were misguided. I assumed they had made a mistake about my intentions and were feeling guilty about their behavior. I was wrong! They knew what they had done, and were laughing about it! Killing them was the only option, but it didn't help! Even though it was just, it didn't make the empty feeling go away! I still feel like an outcast!

I get it now. You have the same attitude. You're just like those other men! You pretend you're on my side, you befriend me, put me off-guard! However, that's not how you really feel! The truth is, you hate me! You and the others are jealous of my power!

I'm surrounded by enemies. It's obvious everyone hates me. I'll have to kill them, all of them. I have to do whatever is necessary to survive. Why does everyone around here hate me so much? Is it because they're all jealous of my power? That has to be the reason. They want to bring me down. I'll just have to strike back at them first. There is only one way to deal with these people...

Our vision? What do you mean by the word 'our'? You've got a lot of nerve! Tell me something: do you actually consider yourself my equal? Let me remind you: you're my sword, so don't get too cocky! Just do as you're told and keep your mouth shut!

Ideals? Don't make me laugh. There are no ideals in this world. We're all left with only one thing: the despair of not being able to make those ideals come true. But I've now discovered that despair releases my true power. Despair is the force that breaks my shackles and frees my heart to do as it truly wishes!

Those with power are the ones who get to impose order on this world, and in the midst of chaos, that order prevails right or wrong! If that power is victorious, even if it's dark, black will become the color of what's right!

As a Shinigami and your master, I was the one who gave birth to your power! All you ever needed to do in your life after that was simply obey me! To me, you've always been nothing more than a sword, simply a mere tool of mine...and a mere tool shouldn't be so conceited!
You've become nothing more than a hindrance to me. I don't need to use a pathetic, unstable sword like you. My power alone is enough.
A Zanpakutō is merely a tool. There are countless replacements.

My enemies' skills are so irrelevant! Everyone falls to their knees before me, and it's all because of my own power! I don't need anything from a Zanpakutō! I'm the most powerful Shinigami to ever live!

No one acknowledged what I did despite all my successes. Instead, they branded me a traitor and tried to seal me away! If that was going to be the case, I had to create a place for myself somewhere! Order is created by power! With my power, I'm going to become king of the new world!
My power is like no other! It is an absolute power that has no equal, not here or anywhere else in the universe!

description: Masayoshi (正義, Masayoshi) was a former member of the Gotei 13 who traveled around Soul Society with the Partisan Squad that hunted down drifting Hollows. Masayoshi has dark grey eyes and messy, dark hair that falls to his neck, with a bang that falls between his eyes. The line of his jaw has stubble all across it, giving him an unkempt appearance. Masayoshi is leanly muscled and wears the standard garb of a Shinigami, but over the top he wears a ragged cloak suited for his traveling lifestyle.

media.alt: Masayoshi's wife after he killed her.
Masayoshi tells the story of his wife's death.
Mayu asks to go with Masayoshi.
Masayoshi sacrifices himself to save Mayu.

description: Ran'Tao (蘭島, Rantao) is a former Shinigami researcher who oversaw the project responsible for the creation of the Bount. Ran'Tao is a slender and youthful-looking woman with thin gold-rimmed glasses, long brown hair usually done up with a hairpin with a large bang falling to the left over her forehead, and brown eyes. She wears red lipstick and a standard shihakushō underneath a lab coat. In order to seal Ran'Tao's powers away, a seal resembling overlapping kanji was inscribed into her back.

media.alt: Ran'Tao approaches a Bount as a friend with the intention of protecting them from persecution.
Ran'Tao argues on behalf of the Bount to Central 46, who decide to massacre them instead.
Ran'Tao saves a young Eugene Currier from the massacre and gives him an amulet.
Ran'Tao joins Ichigo Kurosaki's battle against Jin Kariya.
Ran'Tao reveals the truth behind the creation of the Bount and their immortality.
Ran'Tao confronts Kariya in the Seireitei.
Ran'Tao channels Kariya's power in order to restrain him so Uryū Ishida can kill him.
Ran'Tao has Gō Koga brought to her dwelling so she can hear his story.
Ran'Tao's Bount amulet, activated by Jin Kariya.

quotes.quote: I tried to get close to the Bount, hoping that I might be able to save them. I admit I felt responsible somehow. After all, they were just innocent victims of our experiments.
Try to do your best. We all need to work together in order to help you and the Bount live a life without worries or fear.
I'm sorry, little one. You'll be forced to endure much suffering, but I believe one day you will rise again, and to see that day, you must live!
The attitude of the Shinigami seems to have changed a great deal, and not for the better. How vulgar.
A Shinigami and a Quincy? That's a very interesting combination.
Just deal with it, I'm almost done. That's it, you're all healed. Never underestimate science.

I made a very unpopular prediction: I said it was inevitable that the Bount would use any means they could to return to Soul Society. I came up with a plan. I suggested we publicize everything and accept the Bount into our society...and this was my reward.
I have lived only to save you! There is not a single Shinigami remaining who remembers the past! Soul Society has changed! Finally, I can save the Bount!
Even if you're the last one, I can still save you!
Do it now! Shoot him! Quickly! Forget about me, shoot now while you have the chance! Don't you dare let this Bount add to his crimes! Yes...that's how it must be.
You don't have to worry about me! This is no surprise to me, Quincy. I used this power knowing full well what would happen!

You're free to go, but you should stay here until your wounds have healed. I don't think there's anything left for me to do here anymore. After all this time, I don't plan to return to the Seireitei...but I would like to hear the story of the last Bount.

description: Eikichirō Saidō (西堂榮吉郎, Saidō Eikichirō) is a Shinigami working for the Onmitsukidō who was assigned to find Rukia Kuchiki in the Human World during The Death Trilogy Overture. He is currently the Shinigami assigned to patrol Kagamino City. Saidō is a tall, fair-skinned man with a somewhat angular face and pronounced chin. He has dark brown eyes with small pupils and short black hair, with two bangs of different lengths falling on the right side of his face.

media.alt: Saidō plays a game of spinning tops with some children from the Rukongai.
Saidō is tasked with finding Rukia Kuchiki.
Saidō confronts Rukia in the forest near the cemetery.
Saidō leaps back from Rukia when she attempts to attack him.
Saidō frees Karin Kurosaki from Grand Fisher's grasp so Ichigo Kurosaki can fight him properly.
Saidō convinces a young Plus to leave before she is destroyed.
Saidō overwhelms Ichigo during their clash.

quotes.quote: Sorry, I hate to be caught napping, but these missions just get so dull sometimes that I just can't seem to stay awake.

Why not admit it? You're involved with that kid whose mother was killed by a Hollow! The guy with the spiky hair? You feel sorry for him or are you looking for fun in the Human World? Nothing to be embarrassed about, my little flower. Everybody needs love, and I guess the best you could do was a Human boy to get all smoochy with!

I'm a Shinigami, kid, and we fight Hollows. We kill them without mercy, no matter what. When a Hollow attacks at random and kills someone, that person's loved ones are the real victims. They're left with nothing but an emptiness. As a Shinigami, I couldn't let that happen. We must always protect the innocent.
Time to go home. I'm not so heartless as to break up a serious couple.

description: Fujimaru Kudō (宮能藤丸, Kudō Fujimaru) was a Shinigami in the Fifth Division during the time Seigen Suzunami was captain. Fujimaru has dirty blonde hair with two hairpieces on both sides of his bangs, and the middle on the bridge of his nose. Besides the standard Shinigami uniform, he wears a bright red ribbon in his hair that rests on his left shoulder. Much like his sister, his eyes are bright blue.

media.alt: Fujimaru's Shikai options: Speed, Tech, and Power.

description: Matsuri Kudō (宮能まつ梨, Kudō Matsuri) was a Shinigami of the Fifth Division during the time Seigen Suzunami was captain. Matsuri has light blonde hair kept in a ponytail on the top of her head. Her bangs are messy and long, leaving a good portion of them in the middle of her face. She wears the standard Shinigami uniform with a headband that has a flower attached to it. Her eyes are bright blue. Matsuri is a hard-working individual who takes her duties seriously.

media.alt: Matsuri's Shikai options: Speed, Tech, and Power.

description: Shiyo (詩葉, Shiyo) is a character from the Bleach video game Bleach: The 3rd Phantom. She is a girl residing in the Human World during the game's events. Shiyo wears a bright yellow kimono and a headband to match. The headband is decorated with several bright green leaves, the same color as her eyes. She wears a green wrap around her waist, as well.

Konoka Suzunami (朱司波 伊花, Suzunami Konoka) was the sister of the former captain of the 5th Division, Seigen Suzunami. Konoka has long red hair parted down the side, with only the right side of her bangs on her forehead, and dark green eyes. She wears a hair clip in the shape of a flower on her right side, which rests on her shoulder, and a light pink kimono with a red cloth around her waist.[1] Despite descending from nobility, Konoka has a kind personality.
